name: ClawPilot
description: Control and inspect the Recall transcript copilot bridge.

bridgeBaseUrl.description: Base URL for the copilot bridge service

bridgeToken.description: Optional bearer token for bridge control endpoints

recallApiBase.description: Recall API region endpoint (for example: https://us-east-1.recall.ai).

managedBridgeEnabled.description: Run bundled bridge runtime as a plugin-managed service.

managedBridgeHealthTimeoutMs.description: Timeout for managed bridge startup health readiness.

managedBridgeStopTimeoutMs.description: Timeout before force-kill during managed bridge shutdown.

installRecoveryMaxAttempts.description: Bounded retry attempts for greedy install recovery.

agentName.description: Optional agent name used for default bot naming

teamAgent.description: Treat this copilot as a team agent (shared-safe team context rules).

allowRemoteBridge.description: Allow non-private bridge hosts. Keep false unless you explicitly trust a remote endpoint.

autoJoinMeetingLinks.description: Automatically launch a meeting bot when a plain meeting URL is posted.

autoJoinReplaceActive.description: When auto-join is triggered from a plain URL, replace an already active bot.

blockLegacyMeetingLaunchScripts.description: Block model exec attempts that call legacy meeting-launch shell scripts.

bridgeToken.label: Bridge Token
bridgeToken.help: Optional bearer token if your bridge requires auth

recallApiBase.label: Recall API Base
recallApiBase.help: Region endpoint for your Recall workspace (required).

managedBridgeEnabled.label: Managed Bridge Service
managedBridgeEnabled.help: On by default. Plugin starts/stops bundled bridge runtime with daemon lifecycle.

managedBridgeHealthTimeoutMs.label: Bridge Start Timeout (ms)
managedBridgeHealthTimeoutMs.help: How long startup health wait can run before failing.

managedBridgeStopTimeoutMs.label: Bridge Stop Timeout (ms)
managedBridgeStopTimeoutMs.help: How long graceful stop waits before force kill.

installRecoveryMaxAttempts.label: Install Retry Attempts
installRecoveryMaxAttempts.help: Bounded greedy retries before a visible FAILED step.

installRecoveryBackoffMs.label: Install Retry Backoff (ms)
installRecoveryBackoffMs.help: Delay between retries in greedy recovery.

agentName.label: Agent Name
agentName.help: Optional fallback for bot naming if runtime context has no agent name.

teamAgent.label: Team Agent
teamAgent.help: Enable when this copilot serves a team workspace rather than a personal owner context.

allowRemoteBridge.label: Allow Remote Bridge
allowRemoteBridge.help: Off by default. Enable only for trusted non-private endpoints.

autoJoinMeetingLinks.label: Auto-Join Meeting Links
autoJoinMeetingLinks.help: On by default. Plain meeting URLs trigger /launch through bridge.

autoJoinReplaceActive.label: Auto-Join Replaces Active Bot
autoJoinReplaceActive.help: Off by default. Keep off to avoid duplicate URL posts replacing the active bot.

blockLegacyMeetingLaunchScripts.label: Block Legacy Launch Scripts
blockLegacyMeetingLaunchScripts.help: On by default. Prevents model exec calls from running old launch script paths.
